blog.title: First Post
blog.body: Mobile360 was one of the highlights of the Philippine Marketing Association's May membership assembly. The event's topic was Differentiated Content and Digital Media in which Mobile360 was introduced as an effective tool to deliver content in highly-engaging ways.
